remarks: Define the topology extractor function.  This differs from ~ df-tset when a structure has been restricted using ~ df-ress ; in this case the ` TopSet ` component will still have a topology over the larger set, and this function fixes this by restricting the topology as well. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
statement: df-topn $p |- TopOpen = ( w e. _V |-> ( ( TopSet ` w ) |`t ( Base ` w ) ) ) $.
